Headline: Statement Of NIL Deviation And Variation
Annoucement_Description: there is no deviation or variation from the objects of the rights issue in the utilization of proceeds as stated in the letter of offer during the quarter ended march 31 2025. vikas jain is the managing director and chief executive officer of swiss military consumer goods limited. the funds will be used to investinfuse funds in sm travel gear private limited for the acquisition of plant machinery.

Headline: Appointment Of Internal Auditor
Annoucement_Description: the board of directors of rupa company limited the company at their meeting held today interalia transacted the following business. the board considered and approved the audited financial results standalone and consolidated of the company along with audit report for the quarter and financial year ended march 31 2025. the said financial results along with the audit report with unmodified opinion issued by ms. singhi co. are enclosed herewith. approved the divestment of entire shareholding of 50000 equity shares of rs. 10 each held in rupa fashions private limited rfpl. rfpl shall cease to be the wholly owned subsidiary of the company. approved modification of code of practices and procedures for fair disclosure of unpublished price sensitive information. mr. keshav agarwal was appointed as the vicepresident of the company. he was also the secretarial auditor of the firm. the firm was founded in 1881.

Headline: Results - Financial Results For The Period 31-03-2025
Annoucement_Description: the board of directors at their meeting held on wednesday the 21t may 2025 has decided and approved following important businesses. the extract of financial results in the prescribed format shall be published in all editions of businessstandard english and any hindi newspaper. the standalonefinancial results for the quarter and year ended 31 march 2025 shall beavailable on the websites of the stock exchanges where equity shares of the company are listed. the audit report with unmodified opinion on the financial results of the company for the year ended on 31 march2025. the audit report is signed by nitesh kumar ceo of gallantt. a. 374.0 3922a507..57.07. prolit ros for the fnod autoimmune11644.. .32.32.39. cdp.d1ffirle ahcme net d iax 20..219.13.13342.28342417.174527.40.40 925.40

Headline: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
Annoucement_Description: the board of directors on the recommendation made by the audit committee at their meetings held on may 2025 has approved a proposal for the appointment of ms. b s s associates company secretaries as the secretarial auditors of the company. the appointment will be for a term of five consecutive years commencing from fy 202526 till 202930. the board at its meeting held on may 2025 approved the appointment of b s s associates as secretarial auditors for a term of five consecutive years. the firm has had a long and trustworthy history.

Headline: Board Meeting Intimation for Considering And Approving Inter Alia The Audited Financial Results Of The Company As Per IND-AS For The Quarter And Year Ended March 31, 2025.
Annoucement_Description: the board of directors of the company is scheduled to be held on thursday may 29 2025 to transact the following proposal apart from the other items as per the agenda or additional items with the permission of the chair if any. to consider and approve inter alia the audited financial results of the company as per indas for the quarter and year ended march 31 2025. as per sebi prohibition of insider trading regulations 2015 and companys internal code for prohibition of insider trading code the trading window for dealing in the securities has already been closed.

Headline: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On Wednesday, May 21, 2025
Annoucement_Description: the board of directors of the company at its meeting held today ie. wednesday may 21 2025 have considered and approved the following. the audited financial results standalone and consolidated of the. company for the fourth quarter and financial year ended march 31 2025 along with the statutory auditors. report. the brief profile of the auditor is enclosed herewith as annexurev. the brief details of the aforesaid personnel as prescribed under sebi listing regulations read with sebi circular sebi hocfdpod2cirp0155 dated november 11 2024 are enclosed as annexure vi. the board meeting commenced at 300 p.m. and concluded at 730 p. m. ue inr 5.0 each in mnrl for every 100000 one lakh fully paid equity shares of mrpls.

Headline: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
Annoucement_Description: the board of directors of times guaranty limited has approved the appointment of ms. aabid co. as the secretarial auditors of the company for the financial year 20242025. the detailed disclosure in relation to the appointment is enclosed as annexurei. ms. aabid co. is a mumbaibased company secretary firm with over 15 years of experience in the legal and secretarial domain. the firm offers endtoend secretarial compliance solutions.

Headline: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Acquisition
Annoucement_Description: gmr hyderabad international airport limited ghial has entered into a share purchase agreement spa to acquire a 70% stake in esr gmr logistics park private limited. the acquisition is expected to be concluded within onemonth subject to certain conditions precedents. the proposed acquisition would not be a related party transaction for the company. the promoterpromoter group of the company do not hold any interest in the said transaction.
